vignette.name: Max Hardware Library Package Overview
vignette.p: The Max Hardware Library looks to collect together a series of utility objects at interacting with electronics hardware like Arduino. The package provides objects and examples for communicating via Bluetooth Low Energy and for casting raw byte data to other data types.
Source code for the library is open and avilable at github.com/mhamilt/max-hardware-library. Contact the repository owner for any feature requests.

ul.li: max-ble - Interface with Bluetooth Low Energy devices like mobile devices, Arduino and other micro-controllers with BLE capability
byte-cast - Cast a list of bytes to other data formats.
mhl.subscribing.maxpat - Subscribing to a BLE Characteristic with a notifying property
mhl.rssi.maxpat - Filtering out devices by signal strength.
mhl.using-umenus.maxpat - Using a umenu to store discovered BLE devices
mhl.arduino-notify.maxpat - Accompanying patcher for included Arduino sketch demonstrating how to advertise over BLE and read with max-ble
mhl.byte-cast-example.maxpat - Casting bytes to data types
mhl.formats.maxpat - Data formats supported by byte-cast
